评论概述: Happy overall, with a few caveats
评论详情: I like the way these loafers look—and the royal blue is rich and enjoyable. They are ever so slightly bigger than I anticipated based on my measurements (I used the chart and you should, too), but they'll work.  While "suede" is in the title as of this writing, it is definitely not suede. "Velvet" is also in the title, and that's a better description.  They smell strongly of petroleum products and have been living in my garage for weeks. I have a sensitive nose, but I hope to be able to bring them inside sometime!  As a wheelchair user, I can't really comment on walking long distances in them, but they seem comfortable. The gold sole might be a little slick on some hard surfaces.  Overall, I'm happy with them, especially if I'm going to be wearing them outside so the outgassing isn't an issue. See my video and pictures for more!

评论概述: These shoes are so much fun!
评论详情: Obviously these look great! And it goes well with my red velour tracksuit. I love the gold ornamentation and trim it fits so well with the red. I'm very pleased with the look, the feel, the quality is great. The shoe has that pleasant new shoe smell too - so good! What else can I say? I love these shoes!

Smooth looking shoes to add a pop of color to your outfit. They are comfortable and true to dress shoe size.The teeth charms are made of metal. I like that they come in soft shoe bags to keep your shoes nicely stored away after use. They do not appear to look cheap with seams and glue showing. I rated them 4stars because I haven't had them for more than a month to be able to tell you if the charms fall off and if the fabric falls apart or fades. So far for the one event they were a hit and lasted.
